backend/main.mo: Main canister actor implementing access control, user approval, profile management, and user blocking using mixins and Map-based storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, and test IDs for recent UI and settings enhancements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-like mapping providing short descriptions of various frontend files for reference.
frontend/DEPLOY_RETRY_RUNBOOK.md: Runbook explaining how to retry deployments, including steps for rebuild, monitoring, log capture, and common issue guidance.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layers and CSS variables defining light/dark theme colors, borders, and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up root container and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring authentication, block checks, storage migrations, and routing between login, admin panel, user dashboard, and blocked view.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Action: Reusable action-tile component with gradient backgrounds, size variants, and icon/label rendering.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/dashbo: Exports shared Tailwind class constants for consistent dashboard borders, padding, and styling.
frontend/src/components/feedback/Confirm: Reusable confirmation dialog using AlertDialog with customizable text, variant, and confirm/cancel handlers.
Simple wrapper around sonner toast providing success, error, and info notifications.
Main layout shell with header, footer, and logout confirmation dialog, plus quick-action buttons for loan and calculator.
frontend/src/components/layout/BottomShe: Bottom sheet modal component with backdrop, slide-up animation, and scroll lock handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/Dashboard: Configurable footer bar providing up to three action buttons with icons and gradients.
Centered container layout with fixed height and professional background styling for dashboard views.
frontend/src/components/layout/PopupModa: Full-screen popup modal with backdrop, close button, scroll lock, and animated scaling.
frontend/src/features/admin/AdminPanel.t: Admin panel controller that switches between dashboard sections, handles logout, and renders various admin views.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/A: Bottom navigation bar for admin views with icons and active-state highlighting.
Grid-based admin menu showing navigational tiles whose labels support overrides and branding.
Displays the admin avatar by checking identity, stored profile photos, branding logo, or a fallback image.
Provides the main admin page layout with a fixed header, avatar, optional actions, scrollable content, and a footer with configurable buttons.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/a: Defines admin navigation view types and a list of labeled navigation items with associated icons.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/A: Loads account data from storage and shows KPI-style summary cards for income, expenses, and due amount.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/App: Manages pending user approval requests, allowing approve/reject actions with confirmation and storage updates.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Blo: Lists approved users, shows their block status, and supports blocking/unblocking them via backend actor calls.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Com: Handles adding, listing, and deleting company payment reports while showing totals and requiring confirmation before saving.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Fin: Displays final balances per worker by loading stored workers and account totals and computing remaining amounts.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Nas: Manages adding, listing, and deleting snack (nasta) cost entries and updates per‑worker account balances.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Pay: Handles creation and removal of payment/loan entries and updates each worker’s account payment totals.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Pro: Records production quantities and rates per worker and maintains a sortable production history without affecting accounts.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Set: Thin wrapper that renders the system settings panel.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Sys: Provides full system settings management including labels, layout rules, branding, custom sections, user sharing, and backup import/export.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Use: Displays user approval and blocking management sections.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Wor: Manages worker rate settings including add, delete, lock, update rates, and selection state synced with storage.
Tracks work output using worker-specific rates, computes per‑worker totals, and stores work history entries.
frontend/src/features/auth/BlockedAccoun: Displays a blocked account message with logout support.
frontend/src/features/auth/LoginView.tsx: Provides login form handling, validation, branding display, and toggling to registration view.
Handles new user registration requests with validation and storage of pending requests.
frontend/src/features/support/SupportVie: Implements support messaging for users and admins, loading threads and sending messages.
frontend/src/features/user/components/Cl: Shows a live updating digital clock with formatted time and date.
frontend/src/features/user/components/Se: Displays a bottom sheet showing selected workers with total work, cost, and due amounts loaded from storage.
frontend/src/features/user/components/Us: Renders KPI summary cards for due, work, and taken amounts with customizable labels.
frontend/src/features/user/payment/Nasta: Loads and displays a user's filtered nasta history entries with per‑head totals and a grand total.
frontend/src/features/user/payment/Payme: Shows filtered payment (loan) history for the logged‑in user and calculates total per‑head amounts.
frontend/src/features/user/production/pr: Aggregates normalized production history by worker to compute totals for double, single, and earnings.
frontend/src/features/user/production/Pr: Displays production history with summary totals and a table of worker entries sorted by timestamp.
frontend/src/features/user/production/wo: Normalizes various worker-name fields into a consistent array of worker names.
frontend/src/features/user/profile/Profi: Provides a profile settings page allowing users to change their password and view their profile image.
frontend/src/features/user/UserDashboard: Renders the main user dashboard with KPI loading, navigation between history views, and branding integration.
frontend/src/features/user/work/WorkEntr: Displays a modal showing details of a work entry and the user's calculated amount with a close action.
frontend/src/features/user/work/WorkHist: Loads and displays filtered work history for the logged‑in user and opens an action sheet for entry details.
frontend/src/features/work/workAmount.ts: Provides functions to compute per‑user and total work amounts using new, legacy, or fallback rate data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBranding.ts: Reads and updates branding settings and listens for update events to refresh state.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardOverrides: Loads dashboard label overrides and updates state when override events are dispatched.
frontend/src/hooks/useHashRoute.ts: Tracks the current hash‑based route and provides a navigation helper.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login handling, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useSingleConfirmSubmi: Manages a confirmation‑based submit flow with duplicate‑submit prevention.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserNotice.ts: Loads user notice configuration and updates when notice events occur.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base and utility layers plus custom gradients, colors, layout helpers, and admin UI styles.
frontend/src/lib/branding/brandingStorag: Manages branding settings in localStorage, merging defaults, saving updates, and providing fallback logo URLs.
frontend/src/lib/storage/adminCredential: Handles admin credential storage with validation and comparison using safe storage helpers.
frontend/src/lib/storage/adminDashboardL: Stores and manages dashboard layout rules including ordering, sizes, and updates via localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/storage/adminSelectedWo: Manages selected worker names for reports, supporting load, save, toggle, remove, and initialization.
frontend/src/lib/storage/adminTotalsStor: Loads and saves admin total metrics with safe fallbacks on malformed data.
frontend/src/lib/storage/backupRestore.t: Exports selected app data to a JSON backup and restores it, using safe getters and user notifications.
frontend/src/lib/storage/companyReportSt: Manages payment-type company reports, normalizes legacy data, and computes total work earned.
frontend/src/lib/storage/customSectionsS: Loads and saves custom dashboard section definitions including size and placement.
frontend/src/lib/storage/dashboardOverri: Loads, saves, and resets customizable dashboard label overrides with update events.
frontend/src/lib/storage/labelSettingsSt: Provides ordered label settings with defaults, saving updates and merging legacy entries.
frontend/src/lib/storage/noticeStorage.t: Manages user notice banner configuration with simple load/save and update events.
frontend/src/lib/storage/productionHisto: Loads and normalizes production history entries for consistent UI rendering and saves raw entries.
frontend/src/lib/storage/safeStorage.ts: Wraps localStorage with safe read/write/remove helpers, array normalization, and storage update events.
frontend/src/lib/storage/storageSchema.t: Handles versioned localStorage migrations, normalizing histories, worker data, and company reports.
frontend/src/lib/storage/supportMessagin: Manages support message threads in localStorage, allowing retrieval and message appending.
frontend/src/lib/storage/userIdStorage.t: Assigns and maintains stable numeric user IDs for approved users, with lookup helpers.
frontend/src/lib/storage/userProfileStor: Stores and retrieves profile photos for users and admins using localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/storage/userSharingSett: Loads and saves sharing settings with defaults and dispatches update events.
frontend/src/lib/storage/workerRatesStor: Loads, saves, and migrates worker rate data, including lock state and legacy format syncing.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and identity provider.
frontend/src/state/session/SessionProvid: Provides session state, login/logout logic, user ID handling, and profile updates.
Defines session, login, user, and request-related TypeScript interfaces.
frontend/src/state/session/useSession.ts: Exposes a hook to access the session context.
frontend/src/utils/moneySplit.ts: Provides equal-split money calculations and helpers for per-head amounts.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for parsing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling class-based dark mode, custom color tokens, typography/animation plugins, and extended theme settings. Defines container sizing, custom keyframes, animations, and UI color palettes via CSS variables.
project_state.json: Project state describing UI/UX polishing tasks for an admin panel, listing issues, required images, and feature requests for layout, dropdown readability, input styling, and header avatar addition.
